DOC.brief_summary: The study aim evaluate effectiveness multidimensional worksite intervention program reduce severity metabolic disorder older worker Taiwan .
DOC.brief_title: A Multidimensional Lifestyle Intervention Reduce Risk Metabolic Disorders Older Workers Taiwan
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator conduct quasi-experiment older worker three worksites southern Taiwan . - Qualified subject assign intervention reference group accord availability take part study activity . - A researcher review health record discuss subject his/her health status . - Subjects intervention group receive lifestyle intervention . The activity include motivational presentation increase awareness health problem role lifestyle etiology non-communicable chronic disease . - Subjects organize small group biweekly meeting share experience , stimulate mutual encouragement overcome obstacle . - Anthropometric biochemical indicator measure baseline endpoint ( week 24 ) .
DOC.criteria: fulltime worker age 50 year older willing complete screening questionnaire sign study consent
